import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { addDoc, collection } from 'firebase/firestore' import { db } from '../firebase' const Cargar = () => { const [ description, setDescription ] = useState( '' ) //valor x defecto const [stock, setStock] = useState(0) //valor x defecto const navigate = useNavigate() const personasCollection=collection(db,"Persona") const store= async (e) => { //funcion para almacenar e.preventDefault() await addDoc( personasCollection,{description:description,stock:stock} ) navigate('/') //nos lleva a Show } //en el return es lo que se ve en pantalla, para is2, copiar y pegar desde el div classsname mb-3 hasta su cierre para cada dato return (

Create product

setDescription(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' />
setStock(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' />
) } export default Cargar
